jobTitle: Senior Technical Artist with Graphics Programming Expertise
jobDescription:
Are you a seasoned developer with a flair for art and a passion for AI technology?

We are seeking a Senior Technical Artist with graphics programming skills to join a very experienced game development team in Helsinki. 

Join the dynamic and innovative team, where you will have the opportunity to shape the future of game creation by blending your technical skills with your artistic vision.

This is an exciting role for someone with at least 3 years of game development experience in using Unity and a passion for visual effects and graphics.

Location requirement: for this role you have to be based in Finland.
requirements:
3+ years of experience in game development with a focus on graphics programming and shader development,
Proficient in Unity and C# with an understanding of real-time 3D game development,
Experience with 3D tools like Blender for tweaking and refining game assets,
Interest in AI technology and its application in game development.
responsibilities:
Develop and fine-tune shaders to create stunning visual effects that are dynamic and responsive to AI-driven commands.
Collaborate closely with a very senior team of engineers and artists to push the boundaries of no-code game creation. 
Work with AI technologies to create seamless, visually appealing 3D game environments.
Use your artistic eye to ensure that all assets and visual elements meet the stylistic requirements of the game.
benefits:
Flexible Work Environment: Enjoy the benefits of a fully remote work setup with occasional in-person meetings in Helsinki.
Cutting-Edge Technology: Work with the latest AI and graphics tools to create revolutionary gaming experiences.
Collaborative Culture: Join a small, dedicated team where your contributions are highly valued and impactful.
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a growing startup that's leading the charge in democratizing game development, offering everyone the chance to become a game creator.
